text: (ihramina sthitiyalli) kadalina beteyannu nim'ma palige sam'matisalagide. Adara aharavu nimage hagu kadala prayanikarige upayuktavagide. Nivu ‘ihram’na sthitiyalliruvaga bhubhagada beteyu nim'ma palige nisid'dhavagide. Nivu allahanige anjiri. Konege avana baliye nim'mellarannu ottu serisalaguvudu
